mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.category_id AS "motivationCategory.id", c.name AS "motivationCategory.name", a.phase_id AS "phase.id", p.name AS "phase.name", a.percentage AS "percentage", a.expr_trigger AS "exprTrigger", a.expression AS "expression", a.expr_duration AS "exprDuration", (SELECT group_concat(name) FROM mod_item_category WHERE motivation_ids like concat('%',a.id,'%')) AS "exprItem", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", uu.name AS "updateBy.name", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
LEFT JOIN sys_user uu ON uu.id = a.update_by LEFT JOIN mod_motivation_category c ON c.id = a.category_id LEFT JOIN mod_phase p ON p.id = a.phase_id
LEFT JOIN mod_motivation a ON a.id = bb.need_id LEFT JOIN sys_user uu ON uu.id = a.update_by LEFT JOIN mod_motivation_category c ON c.id = a.category_id LEFT JOIN mod_phase p ON p.id = a.phase_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mod_motivation( id, name, category_id, phase_id, percentage, expr_trigger, expression, expr_duration, expr_item, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{motivationCategory.id}, #{phase.id}, #{percentage}, #{exprTrigger}, #{expression}, #{exprDuration}, #{exprItem}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE mod_motivation SET name = #{name}, category_id = #{motivationCategory.id}, phase_id = #{phase.id}, percentage = #{percentage}, expr_trigger = #{exprTrigger}, expression = #{expression}, expr_duration = #{exprDuration}, expr_item = #{exprItem}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT group_concat(name) FROM mod_motivation WHERE #{motivationIds} like concat('%',id,'%')
